'''達吉斯坦松田鼠'''({{lang|la|'''''Microtus daghestanicus'''''}})，又名'''高加索松田鼠'''，是[[鼠總科|鼠總科]][[田鼠屬|田鼠屬]][[松田鼠亞屬|松田鼠亞屬]]的一個品種，可在[[俄羅斯|俄羅斯]][[高加索地區|高加索地區]]、[[格魯吉亞|格魯吉亞]]、[[亞美尼亞|亞美尼亞]]及[[阿塞拜疆|阿塞拜疆]]發現。

== 參考資料 ==
* Baillie, J. 1996.  [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/13428/all Microtus daghestanicus].   [http://www.iucnredlist.org 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. ]  Downloaded on 19 July 2007.
* Baillie, J. 1996.  [http://www.iucnredlist.org/search/details.php/13448/all Microtus nasarovi].   [http://www.iucnredlist.org 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. ]  Downloaded on 19 July 2007.
*Musser, G. G. and M. D. Carleton. 2005. Superfamily Muroidea. Pp. 894-1531 ''in'' Mammal Species of the World a Taxonomic and Geographic Reference. D. E. Wilson and D. M. Reeder eds. Johns Hopkins University Press, Baltimore.
